document.full_text: the british, french and u.s. leaders vowed on friday to press on with their military campaign in libya until muammar gaddafi leaves power, and rebels said his forces were pounding the besieged city of misrata with missiles.
document.title: allies vow no halt to campaign until gaddafi goes
lines_and_colors: the british, french and u.s. leaders vowed on friday to press on with their military campaign in libya until muammar gaddafi leaves power, and rebels said his forces were pounding the besieged city of misrata with missiles.
